sections.title: Conformance Status
paras: Hochschule Bielefeld is committed to making its web services accessible in accordance with Sec. 3 BITV 2.0 and Directive (EU) 2016/2102.
This website (https://vpstunden.hsbi.de/) is currently partially conformant. The non-accessible content is listed below.

sections.title: Non-accessible Content
list: Some images/icons do not yet provide suitable alternative text.
In some cases, keyboard focus visibility and/or focus order are insufficient.
Some PDF/download documents are not yet fully accessible.
Dynamic content (e.g., charts) is not yet fully usable with screen readers.
paras: We are working on gradually remedying the issues mentioned.

sections.title: Enforcement Procedure
paras: If you do not receive a satisfactory response from us within a reasonable period, you can contact the responsible enforcement or conciliation body.
Please insert the details of the authority responsible for your institution (state enforcement body/conciliation body).

sections.title: Preparation of This Statement
paras: This statement was created on 14 October 2025.
Assessment of compliance with the requirements was carried out by means of a self-evaluation.
This statement was last reviewed on 14 October 2025.
